title: We're unable to log you in because you may be offline.
body: {{item:3070}} I was online and playing 4 hours ago but now I can't log back in {{item:3070}}  Somebody please help.

replies.body: No tears, we can help!  Something with your settings or network might have changed and blocking you from reaching our services.  Try out the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this towards a fix.
